jfxtras.labs.scene.control

Class BigDecimalField

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.control.Control
          • jfxtras.labs.scene.control.BigDecimalField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable

    public class BigDecimalField
extends javafx.scene.control.Control
    Input field for BigDecimal values. This control has the following features: - BigDecimal number is parsed and formatted according to the provided NumberFormat - up/down arrow keys and buttons increment/decrement the number by stepwidth. If minValueProperty() and/or maxValue are set, values outside these boundaries are not accepted for number.
